entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:44 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 03:00 AM AST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 87 %

Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h gust 28 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
